title: Number of road deaths in Germany 2006 to 2018
summary: Overall Number of fatalities has decreased over the Year.
Number of fatalities is slightly decreasing from 2007 to 2013.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2009 and 2010.
The highest Number of fatalities, of value 4949.0 was reached at Year 2007
Minimum Number of fatalities about 3339.0 was reached at Year 2013
min_summary: Overall Number of fatalities has decreased over the Year.
Number of fatalities is slightly decreasing from 2007 to 2013.
mid_summary: In general Number of fatalities has fallen over the Year.

Minimum Number of fatalities about 3339.0 was reached at Year 2013
